title: S12 Ep176: The Dream Doctor: What Dreams May Come
itunes:title: The Dream Doctor: What Dreams May Come
description:
Dr. Michael Lennox is a practicing psychologist and one of the most respected and sought after dream interpreters in the U.S. He has appeared on SyFy, MTV, and many radio shows.

Today we discuss the meanings of dreams and nightmares, ghostly visitations and the nature of sleep and the science of dreams.

http://www.michaellennox.com/
